attributes.additional_details: Imagine having needles drugs and unknown substances pointed in your direction or having shampoo rubbed in your eyes just to see if it would sting humans. More than 115 million animals have this happening to them every day!how would YOU feel! NOT OKAY!
attributes.background: To ban testing on animals especially our products

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/657943
